snippet: STUCKY--Steven. The Board of Trustees and staff of the American Academy in Rome mourn the passing of Steven Stucky. Steven's relationship with the Academy began in 2004 when he served on the musical composition jury for the Rome Prize. He was a Resident in 2006 and became a Trustee in 2007, serving four terms and remained engaged with AAR activities. We will miss his great passion and enthusiasm. 1/3
lead_paragraph: STUCKY--Steven. The Board of Trustees and staff of the American Academy in Rome mourn the passing of Steven Stucky. Steven's relationship with the Academy began in 2004 when he served on the musical composition jury for the Rome Prize. He was a Resident in 2006 and became a Trustee in 2007, serving four terms and remained engaged with AAR activities. We will miss his great passion and enthusiasm. 1/3
